Pre Battle Sequence

No. Step Details
1 Make a Challenge & Stake Territory • Just organise a game.
• Randomise “challenger”.
• No penalties for saying no.
2 Recruit Hired Guns • Skip this step.
3 Determine Scenario • Main campaign game -> Consult with the arbitrator.
• Otherwise… pick something fun / thematic.
• Use the Open Hive war pack if struggling to choose (https://openhivewar.com/)
4 Set up the Battlefield • As normal.
5 Choose Crews • If you are fighting the gang with a bounty on it (which is determined at the start each campaign week) you may recruit a bounty hunter for free.
• If you have the lower gang rating; you may choose to spend up to the difference in your gang ratings on this bounty hunter which must come from the guild.
• Use any reasonable model to represent it.
6 Announce Territory Boons • As normal.
7 Gang Tactics • As normal.
8 Deployment • As normal.
